PaymentMethod

public PaymentMethod(PaymentMethod soapPaymentMethodObject)
This constructor constructs an PaymentMethod object as defined in this Vindicia SOAP client library from a SOAP object as defined in the AXIS soap stubs generated from the Vindicia WSDL for this object.

Parameters:
soapPaymentMethodObject - PaymentMethod object as generated by AXIS soap stubs

PaymentMethod

public PaymentMethod(java.lang.String soapLogin,
                     java.lang.String soapPassword,
                     PaymentMethod soapPaymentMethodObject)
This constructor constructs an PaymentMethod object as defined in this Vindicia SOAP client library from a SOAP object as defined in the AXIS soap stubs generated from the Vindicia WSDL for this object.

Parameters:
soapLogin - Your Vindicia soap login for the Vindicia server you are sending your requests to
soapPassword - Your Vindicia soap password for the Vindicia server you are sending your requests to
soapPaymentMethodObject - PaymentMethod object as generated by AXIS soap stubs
Method Detail

fetchByAccount

public static PaymentMethod[] fetchByAccount(java.lang.String srd,
                                             Account account,
                                             java.lang.Boolean includeChildren)
                                      throws VindiciaReturnException,
                                             VindiciaServiceException
Loads a list of PaymentMethods by the Account that owns them

Parameters:
srd - sparse return descriptor
account - Account for which to retrieve associated PaymentMethods. Account object should have at least one of VID or merchantAccountId set (if both are set, VID is checked first).
includeChildren - If true, include in the result all the payment methods for any child accounts of this account (if false, or if omitted, we will not include them)
Returns:
array of PaymentMethod objects - The resultant objects
Throws:
VindiciaReturnException - for non-200 return codes from Vindicia
VindiciaServiceException

Loads a list of PaymentMethods by the Account that owns them

srd - sparse return descriptor
account - Account for which to retrieve associated PaymentMethods. Account object should have at least one of VID or merchantAccountId set (if both are set, VID is checked first).
includeChildren - If true, include in the result all the payment methods for any child accounts of this account (if false, or if omitted, we will not include them)

array of PaymentMethod objects - The resultant objects

update

public PaymentMethodUpdateReturn update(java.lang.String srd,
                                        boolean validate,
                                        int minChargebackProbability,
                                        boolean replaceOnAllAutoBills,
                                        java.lang.String sourceIp,
                                        java.lang.Boolean replaceOnAllChildAutoBills,
                                        java.lang.Boolean ignoreAvsPolicy,
                                        java.lang.Boolean ignoreCvnPolicy)
                                 throws VindiciaReturnException,
                                        VindiciaServiceException
Creates a new PaymentMethod object or updates an existing one.

Parameters:
srd - sparse return descriptor
validate - Whether to just update or validate first
minChargebackProbability - If Chargeback Probability from risk scoring is greater than this, the transaction will fail. Default is 100 (all payment methods are applied).
replaceOnAllAutoBills - Set to true if you want the updates to the payment method to propagate to all autobills using this payment method. Defaults to false meaning no autobills will be updated
sourceIp - Source IP this payment method was requested from (the customer's, not the merchant's). Useful in fraud prevention.
replaceOnAllChildAutoBills - If true, the update will propagate to the autobills belonging to children of this account. If replaceOnAllAutoBills is false, this will be ignored. If replaceOnAllAutoBills is true and replaceOnAllChildAutoBills is true, this will affect only the parent account.
ignoreAvsPolicy - Set to 1, to not evaluate any custom or default avs policy.
ignoreCvnPolicy - Set to 1, to not evaluate any custom or default cvn policy.
Returns:
PaymentMethodUpdateReturn - custom return bean class for this method
Throws:
VindiciaReturnException - for non-200 return codes from Vindicia
VindiciaServiceException

validate

public PaymentMethodValidateReturn validate(java.lang.String srd,
                                            java.lang.String sourceIp,
                                            int minChargebackProbability,
                                            java.lang.Boolean ignoreAvsPolicy,
                                            java.lang.Boolean ignoreCvnPolicy)
                                     throws VindiciaReturnException,
                                            VindiciaServiceException
Evaluates a PaymentMethod for fraud and validates it by contacting a payment processor and assures its correctness

Parameters:
srd - sparse return descriptor
sourceIp - Source IP this payment method was requested from (the customer's, not the merchant's). Necessary for fraud risk scoring.
minChargebackProbability - Chargeback Probability evaluated for this payment method from fraud risk scoring is greater than this, Vindicia will not contact your payment processor for further validation of the payment method. If you do not want fraud score evaluated, set this to its maximum possible value of 100. If you set this below 100, you should specify the sourceIp parameter and the payment method should contain full billing address.
ignoreAvsPolicy - Set to 1, to not evaluate any custom or default avs policy.
ignoreCvnPolicy - Set to 1, to not evaluate any custom or default cvn policy.
Returns:
PaymentMethodValidateReturn - custom return bean class for this method
Throws:
VindiciaReturnException - for non-200 return codes from Vindicia
VindiciaServiceException
